Text: thank you very much for uploading this 3 part documentary. this is a wonderful and informative piece, and has helped me with my stubbornness in admitting to having depression.
this is such an amazing show!! appreciate it.
I ordered the DVD from PBS and was going to wait for the DVD delivery to watch it, but now I can watch it sooner.  Thanks for sharing. You are too kind!
This is very informative and helps those of us that suffer from chronic depression.  Bravo and thanks again for the up.
I've seen bits and pieces of this great series recently on PBS -- THANKS for allowing me to time shift this and watch when it's convenient for me !
